colorTheory.description: A color theme strictly using only the colors extracted from the PDF: #000000, #FFFFFF, #3366CC. Following Derrida's philosophy of deconstruction, we've preserved the original colors without introducing external elements.
colorTheory.harmony: The primary-secondary contrast between #3366CC and #FFFFFF establishes a clear hierarchy, while the accent colors disrupt traditional patterns.
colorTheory.contrast: Binary oppositions between text (#000000) and background (#FFFFFF) create meaningful contrast that emphasizes legibility and guides the user's attention. Primary (#3366CC) and secondary (#FFFFFF) colors establish a clear hierarchy of interactive elements.
colorTheory.accessibility: The color choices prioritize visibility and legibility, with text-background differentiation meeting accessibility standards.
